title: How to Make an Apple Dip Dessert

steps.headline: Start making the dip by adding the ice cream and milk.
steps.description: Get out a large bowl. Scoop about two scoops of ice cream into the bowl. Add the tablespoons of milk and stir until it's creamy but still thick.

steps.headline: Add the chocolate sauce.
steps.description: Pour the chocolate sauce in your dip. Stir it around gently with a spoon.

steps.headline: Add the Cool Whip.
steps.description: Gather the 1 cup of Cool Whip and add it in the bowl. Stir.

steps.headline: Add the melted caramel.
steps.description: Finally, pour the melted caramel slowly. This time mix it until it's all creamy. The results should look like a light brown, chocolate dip.

steps.headline: Enjoy your dip!
steps.description: Dip the apple slices into the apple dip and enjoy the sweet, cold taste.

text: Start making the dip by adding the ice cream and milk. Get out a large bowl. Scoop about two scoops of ice cream into the bowl. Add the tablespoons of milk and stir until it's creamy but still thick. Add the chocolate sauce. Pour the chocolate sauce in your dip. Stir it around gently with a spoon. Add the Cool Whip. Gather the 1 cup of Cool Whip and add it in the bowl. Stir. Add the melted caramel. Finally, pour the melted caramel slowly. This time mix it until it's all creamy. The results should look like a light brown, chocolate dip. Enjoy your dip! Dip the apple slices into the apple dip and enjoy the sweet, cold taste. Finished.
